title: Tomorrow's Canberra
creator_credit: Fred Schepisi, Don Murray, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and The Film House
brief_description: Impressions of planning projects before the N.C.D.C. from a design by Chicago architect Walter Burley Griffin, with views of development in Canberra as at 1972. Shows the Commission in discussion with advisory groups about such projects as the “Parliamentary Triangle” development and Tuggeranong.
